an6.115:4.3: Being hard to correct, bad friendship, and a scattered mind.
an6.115:4.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.115:4.7: You should develop being easy to correct to give up being hard to correct, good friendship to give up bad friendship, and mindfulness of breathing to give up a scattered mind.
an6.115:4.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
